segments.text: Oh my, look at that water just pouring out of the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water all around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh those kids are being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don't want to startle anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a surprising scene to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
